page.title: 14PROBLEMS OF OLD AGE
page.content: The problem with the bus service is, that the bus route is right at the top of the hill so when the old people want to go into town they have to walk all the way up a steep hill. Lots of the old people don't have cars because they never did learn to drive , so unless one of their relations gives them a lift, they can't go to town.. Some people do manage to walk up to the bus stp so they can go to town; but the bus leaves at about 8.30 for the children to go to school, and that is very early for someone old to get up in the morning. If the old people did get up so early and caught the bus they would have to stay in town all day, until the school bus came back again at 4.00
